#Generated by VisualGDB project wizard.
#Note: VisualGDB will automatically update this file when you add new sources to the project.

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.7)
project(DesktopRaspi64)
set(LIBRARIES_FROM_REFERENCES "")

#target_compile_options(DesktopRaspi64 PRIVATE -pthread)


set(CMAKE_INCLUDE_CURRENT_DIR ON)
set(CMAKE_AUTOMOC ON)
set(CMAKE_AUTOUIC ON)
set(CMAKE_AUTORCC ON)
find_package(Qt6 COMPONENTS Core Widgets Network Sql REQUIRED)

add_executable(DesktopRaspi64 DesktopRaspi64.cpp MainWindow.cpp MainWindow.ui Sound.cpp Sound.h Udp.cpp Udp.h DataBase.cpp DataBase.h SettingsReader.cpp SettingsReader.h Password.ui Udp_checksum.cpp Udp_rcp_conn.cpp messages_hm785.cpp messages_hm785.h Udp_pressPtt.cpp Udp_call_decoding.cpp Udp_send_call_report.cpp)
target_link_libraries(DesktopRaspi64 Qt6::Widgets Qt6::Network Qt6::Sql "${LIBRARIES_FROM_REFERENCES}")
target_link_libraries(DesktopRaspi64  -lhidapi-libusb)
target_link_libraries(DesktopRaspi64  -lasound)

#target_link_options(DesktopRaspi64 PRIVATE -pthread )
